Package server.handler

Class Handlers

java.lang.Object
server.handler.Handlers
public class Handlers extends Object
Maps URL patterns to different Handlers and allows them to be dispatched correctly.
Version:
1.0 - May 21st 2023
Author:
Harry XU

    • dispatch

      public Response dispatch(Request req) throws HandlerException
      dispatch Dispatches the first registered handler that matches the request and returns the response
      Parameters:
      req - the request to handle
      Returns:
      the response of the dispatched handler
      Throws:
      HandlerException - if no handler is found that can handle the request
